text: Konstantinos Vlachos (, born 6 February 1995) is a Greek footballer who plays for Panegialios in the Football League, as a centre back. ==Career== On 21 January 2019, Panegialios announced the return of Vlachos, after he had played for a Kallithea since October 2018.Στα «μελανόλευκα» ο Κώστας Βλάχος, sportsup.gr, 21 January 2019 ==References== ==External links== * http://www.superleaguegreece.net/el/teams/team/panionios- fc-396/2015-2016-superleague-52/players/kostas-vlachos-1876 Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Greek footballers Category:Greece youth international footballers Category:AEK Athens F.C. players Category:Olympiacos F.C. players Category:Fostiras F.C. players Category:Panionios F.C. players Category:Panegialios F.C. players Category:Kallithea F.C. players Category:Super League Greece players Category:Association football central defenders
title: Konstantinos Vlachos
